title: so know you know
body: so know you know how we feel riot

replies.body: to be quite honest, the only time i ever dc is mid-game when telstra decides to be %%%%%%ed, i have a ping measuring app on my desktop, so for riot to say "please fix you internet before playing more" that's just arrogance at its' height, ill call telstra right before i join the queue and ask them for an outage expectancy graph for my area, honestly riot %%%% off with your troll bull%%%%
i also find it funny how everyone disliked this riot post, and yet in game if anyone stops moving for half a second its REPORT JINX AFK
